name: Bid Whist Multiplayer
description:
Bid Whist Multiplayer is a partnership trick-taking card games like Spades, Hearts & Canasta , but this trick-taking card game is played in pairs in which trump is chosen by players.
Bid Whist Multiplayer also have different game mode like Whist, which are very popular in different countries.
Win against the best card players and increase your CHIPS as if you are betting in a real world.

AMAZING FEATURES
• Different Game Modes: Bid Whist & Whist
• Connect With Facebook & Sync Progress
• Join to your friends’ tables with one click and start to play with them
• Chat with Other Players and Add them as Friends
• Beautiful design and animation.
• Easy and fast to learn and play.
• See Statistics & Leaderboards!
• COMPLETELY FREE TO PLAY

If you want to play Bid Whist, then Join the biggest Bid Whist Multiplayer Community with millions of players in the World!
Prove your talent in card games in online Multiplayer environment..!
Any suggestions? We always love to hear from you and making this App better.

Thank you.
